entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
